name: PickPark
description:
Have you ever wanted to be a master of driver?
Pick up customers and goods to earn money. Drift to park and delivery on time. Unlock your cool cars and explore the world.

How To Play:

- Tap and hold to drive
- Release to brake
- Drive amongst real traffic - pay attention to other cars!
- A variety of awesome vehicles
- Drift to park
- Beautiful city to explore: multiple varied districts
- Varied & fun challenges: complete them all!
